channel.title: 667 Help
channel.description:
I understand there are not many players willing to help people with 667's because of leeching. However i just want to learn how to code and become a better coder. I want to learn ALL about the coding. However there are no good guides out there...
I might be willing to pay, but i do not have the money due to debt but ill be sure to get you money and a good price...
Things i need help with...
Learning how to add Slayer? Correct way of adding Dialogue to npc's. The correct way to fix summoning The correct way to add hp/ bonuses/ and attack styles to a NPC. And a few more things here and there...
I have added hunter by my self.. and shops or what not... but those have guides and are pretty basic, id like to extend my knowledge....

item.title: 667 Help
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

[quote=“mickie456, post:13, topic:440952”][quote author=shabba 56 link=topic=543630.msg3986499#msg3986499 date=1335941848]

it’s the internet, guise. you have spellcheck.
there’s no reason to get so upset, hahah. an insult to my intelligence from you is really painful, man. i might tear up.

on topic - i’m sure you need help on stuff. i’m sure you’ve read tutorials. why can’t they get help too? you’re so strange.

you must be handicapped i bet your one of the leechers too and your here because u need these tutorials too? omg its so hard to use google oh no why wont anybody help me all i can say is i dont care about grammer i dont really care about you never will but if u cant find this shit u shouldnt even bother with rsps go back to runescape and suck some cocks
[/quote]

you’re a bitch :D[/quote]

lol because i wont help u code cheers go begg some other cunt

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Help
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

[quote=“Exure, post:8, topic:440952”][quote author=shabba 56 link=topic=543630.msg3985766#msg3985766 date=1335845100]

there’s no need to be so hostile, shabba. he came here to get help, not be flamed.
if you’re not going to help, probably because you don’t know how to, judging by your grammar, leave.

on topic- i’m sending you the same link i sent him.

mickie, i’ll message you in a few and help you.

lmfao i don’t go to grammer school im sorry its not up to your standerds i wasnt made to live up to yours or anyone elses expectations kid if u cant use bloody google then why bother whit rsps all together ive made many tutorials for 667 even have a look u retard ive even released 667’s took them down due to leechers like use why do i bother helping if no one cares to listen
[/quote]

He has a point, No one will spoon feed you. Some people will and it’s in tuts. Most people will tell u what to do or where to add certain code or edit some of ur code, Don’t be a fucking grammar cunt.

OT: Most already have slayer; Just take a look around, See if enchanted gems work and get a npc who gives tasks. NpcDialogue is in Player>Dialogue You need to make a new .java file in there just copy the contents of some of the existing dialogues and add it in Dialogue manager.[/quote]

there’s a tut on how to add dialogues

Read full topic

OT: Most already have slayer; Just take a look around, See if enchanted gems work and get a npc who gives tasks. NpcDialogue is in Player>Dialogue You need to make a new .java file in there just copy the contents of some of the existing dialogues and add it in Dialogue manager.
